item.description:
Join us for a fun and free night at Nick's Comedy Stop! Conveniently located in Boston's theatre district, Nick's showcases a number of different local comedians. Tickets are usually $20, but we have a number of free passes.

We will meet right outside Nick's at 8pm, the reservation is under the name "Catherine". If you're going to be late, please look for us inside or call 774 232 0000. Please make every effort to arrive on time so we can all sit together.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) outside entrance, or inside after 8pm. If you have trouble finding us, please call 774 232 0000
item.name: Free Tix for Nick's Comedy Stop on Friday Night!
